name: Space Currency
description:
Space is a tough place. Every second is important. The time is your life... literally!

Game made for the #aJamAboutTime.

Commands

WASD/arrows - move the player

SPACE/X/mouse click - shoot

Mouse - camera movement

How to play

The game is composed of 10 waves. Your life is the time (in seconds) you have before you die. For every enemy that you kill, you gain a bunch of seconds. 

At the end of each wave, you can upgrade your spaceship in the shop using your life (the time) as currency. The last wave is a boss.  Good luck.
